page.title: 07MY GAME OF HOCKEY
page.content: MY GAME OF HOCKEY BY JOANNE COOKSEY AFTER WE CAME IN FROM PLAY MR BLUNDELL SAID WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO AND PLAY HOCKEY? SO WE ALL SAID "YES PLEASE".MR BLUNDELL THEN SAID TEAM A LINE UP AT THE DOOR.SO WE DID.TEAM A WENT DOWN TO THE PAVILLION TO GET TWO HOCKEY STICKS AND A BALL.WHILE WE WERE WAITING FOR SIR AND TEAM B NICHOLAS HARVEY GOT OVER THE FENCE AND BACK.THEN DIANE ASKED ME FOR A HOCKEY STICK.I SAID YES.WHILE DIANE AND I WERE PRACTISING SIR WENT TO SEE MRS GJERTSEN.SIR CAME BACK AND BLEW HIS WHISTLE.SIR SAID "GET TO YOUR PLACES.I WAS IN DEFENCE. EMMA STARTED BOSSING RACHEL ABOUT. SUDDENLY THE BALL WAS IN FRONT OF MY EYES.I HIT IT BUT IT DID NOT GO FAR. THEN IT WAS HALF TIME.THE OTHER HALF WAS BETTER.SIR BLEW HIS WHISTLE.WE ALL STOOD STILL.WE TOOK OUR HOCKEY STICKS TO THE PAVILLION.
